scripts.dev: hc s clean && LAIR_PATH=`which lair-keystore` VITE_APP_PORT=$(port) concurrently "sleep 5 && npm run local:watch" "npm run start:hc"
scripts.dweb:gen: hc s clean && echo "pass" | hc s -f=12345,12346 --piped generate $(sed -n 's/^HAPP_PATH="\(.*\)"/\1/p' .env) -n 2 -a emergence network mdns
scripts.dweb:start: LAIR_PATH=`which lair-keystore` echo "pass" | hc s -f=12345,12346 --piped run 0 1 -p 30030,30031
scripts.dweb:restart: LAIR_PATH=`which lair-keystore` echo "pass" | hc s -f=12345,12346 --piped run 0 1
scripts.dweb:gen4: hc s clean && echo "pass" | hc s -f=12345,12346,12347,12348 --piped generate $(sed -n 's/^HAPP_PATH="\(.*\)"/\1/p' .env) -n 4 -a emergence network mdns
scripts.dweb:start4: LAIR_PATH=`which lair-keystore` echo "pass" | hc s -f=12345,12346,12347,12348 --piped run 0 1 2 3 -p 30030,30031,30032,30033
scripts.dweb:restart4: LAIR_PATH=`which lair-keystore` echo "pass" | hc s -f=12345,12346,12347,12348 --piped run 0 1 2 3
scripts.start:hc: echo "starting holochain" && RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s -f=12345,12346 --piped generate $(sed -n 's/^HAPP_PATH="\(.*\)"/\1/p' .env) -n 2 --run=30030,30031 -a emergence network mdns
scripts.local:watch: LAIR_PATH=`which lair-keystore` nodemon src -e ts,json --exec 'npm run local'
